name.value: MP9 - Client - Scenario 6.x - Send MedicationData - MA-Scenarioset6

description.value: Scenario 6.x - Send MedicationData for G. XXX_Hemsbergen.
Send MedicationData in a transaction Bundle
Test client to POST a Bundle of type transaction.
Checks if all resources specified by the scenario can be identified unambiguously.
